messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Space vines are ravaging the station, please get rid of them.. I also require headache pills.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All crew must attempt to combat the space vines, that is an order.. seriously they are taking over!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.
